file.name: here.com-positioning-1.7.0-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    x-twitter: HERE
  description: Positioning API for making location requests.
  title: Positioning
  version: 1.7.0
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - location
  x-document-meta-data:
    copyright: Â© 2019 HERE Europe B.V.
    date-created: 2019-01-02T09:02:51+00:00
    document-id: 5ad3ee14-c41a-4245-9b90-cfc01a090025
  x-logo:
    url: https://twitter.com/HERE/profile_image?size=original
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://developer.here.com/documentation/positioning/swagger/2.0/api_reference/positioning-v1-external-spec.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-providerName: here.com
  x-serviceName: positioning
paths:
  /locate:
    post:
      description: Request WGS-84 compliant geocordinates for a location based on 2G/3G/4G
        cell and/or WLAN measurements.
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_fallback"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_desired"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_required"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_confidence"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_app_id"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/querystring_app_code"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/header_content_encoding_gzip"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/header_content_type_json"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/observations_locate"
        description: Request body containing cell and/or WLAN measurement data
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Request processed successfully and a WGS-84 compliant geocoordinate
            location estimate was included in the response.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_success_locate"
        "400":
          description: The request is malformed. Check the message in the response for
            additional troubleshooting information. The URL query parameters or
            the JSON POST body in the request is invalid.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 400
                      description: "'mnc' must be less than or equal to 999"
                      message: Bad Request
        "401":
          description: Authentication has failed due to incorrect credentials. Check your
            app_id and app_code.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 401
                      description: The request is missing the app_id and app_code
                        parameters. They must both be passed as query
                        parameters. If you do not have app_id and app_code,
                        please obtain them through your customer representative
                        or at http://developer.here.com/myapps.
                      message: Unauthorized
        "403":
          description: Authorization has failed. Access is not allowed with the app_id and
            app_code you provided.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 403
                      description: These credentials do not authorize access. Please
                        contact your customer representative or submit a request
                        here https://developer.here.com/contact-us to upgrade
                        your account. You can also get valid credentials by
                        registering for a free trial license on
                        https://developer.here.com.
                      message: Forbidden
        "404":
          description: >
            The values provided in the request cannot produce any content for
            the response. The location of the WLANs and cells in the request is
            unknown or the locations of the radio measurements are so widely
            scattered that the location cannot be determined. Make sure that the
            network measurements are correct and consistent. Try allowing
            fallbacks 'area' or 'any' for cell positioning and 'singleWifi' for
            WLAN positioning.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 404
                      description: Position not found
                      message: Not Found
        "405":
          description: Method not allowed. Only POST is supported.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 405
                      description: Only HTTP POST method supported
                      message: Not supported
        "500":
          description: An unexpected server error has occurred, try again later.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/response_error"
              examples:
                response:
                  value:
                    error:
                      code: 500
                      description: Something unexpected happened. System administrators
                        have been notified about the problem. Please try again
                        later.
                      message: Internal Server Error
      summary: Locate
servers:
  - url: https://pos.api.here.com/positioning/v1
components:
  parameters:
    header_content_encoding_gzip:
      description: Indicates the data in the body is gzip encoded. Value must be 'gzip'.
      in: header
      name: Content-Encoding
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - gzip
    header_content_type_json:
      description: Indicates the media-type of the request body. Value must be
        'application/json'.
      in: header
      name: Content-Type
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - application/json
    querystring_app_code:
      description: A 20-byte Base64 URL-safe encoded string used for the authentication of
        the client application.
      in: query
      name: app_code
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    querystring_app_id:
      description: A 20-byte Base64 URL-safe encoded string used for the authentication of
        the client application.
      in: query
      name: app_id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    querystring_confidence:
      description: "Confidence level in percent for the accuracy/uncertainty in the
        location estimate response. If not specified, the default is 68 (this
        corresponds to a 68% probability that the true position is within the
        accuracy/uncertainty radius of the location estimate: the higher the
        number, the greater the confidence level)."
      in: query
      name: confidence
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 50
        maximum: 99
    querystring_desired:
      description: Comma-separated list of additional data fields that the service should
        include in the response if data is available. The query parameter
        supports the value 'altitude'.
      in: query
      name: desired
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - altitude
    querystring_fallback:
      description: >
        Acceptable fallback options for cell and WLAN positioning. Values 'area'
        and 'any' apply to cell based positioning, and value 'singleWifi'
        applies to WLAN based positioning. They may both be combined in the same
        request.

        By default cell based positioning returns cell tower level location estimates only. If you allow a WGS-84 compliant geocoordinate location estimate based on LAC, RNC, TAC, NID, or RZ areas, use the fallback=area setting. If you use the fallback=any setting, the service uses all available cell fallback methods and therefore the location estimate in the response may be at the MNC, SID, or MCC level.

        For privacy reasons precise positioning based on a single WLAN AP is not possible. You can use the fallback=singleWifi setting to allow less accurate positioning based on a single WLAN AP. In that case the center location of the position estimate will be deviated and the reported accuracy radius will be larger.
      in: query
      name: fallback
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - any
          - area
          - singleWifi
    querystring_required:
      description: Comma-separated list of additional data fields that the service should
        include in the response. If the data is not available, the response
        contains an error message. The query parameter supports the value
        'altitude'.
      in: query
      name: required
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - altitude
  schemas:
    cell_cdma_locate:
      description: CDMA measurement
      example:
        bsid: 8583
        nid: 10
        nmr:
          - channel: 0
            pnoffset: 357
          - channel: 0
            pnoffset: 366
        sid: 4162
      properties:
        bsid:
          description: Base Station ID, BID
          example: 8583
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        channel:
          description: CDMA channel frequency (Optional, you must specify a value for this
            item when you specify a value for pnoffset)
          example: 1
          maximum: 2047
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nid:
          description: Network Id, NID
          example: 10
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nmr:
          description: CDMA Network measurements (Optional)
          example:
            - channel: 0
              pnoffset: 357
            - channel: 0
              pnoffset: 366
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_cdma_nmr"
          maxItems: 32
          type: array
        pilotpower:
          description: Pilot Power (dBm) (Optional). If Pilot Power is not available
            directly, it needs to be calculated from Total Power in the band and
            Pilot Strength with respect to the Total Power. Pilot power less
            than -142dBm should be mapped to -142. Pilot power greater than
            -49dBm should be mapped to -49.
          example: -96
          maximum: -49
          minimum: -142
          type: integer
        pnoffset:
          description: Pseudonoise offset (Optional, you must specify a value for this item
            when you specify a value for channel)
          example: 367
          maximum: 511
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        rz:
          description: Registration zone (Optional)
          example: 1234
          maximum: 4095
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        sid:
          description: System Id, SID
          example: 4162
          maximum: 32767
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
      required:
        - sid
        - nid
        - bsid
      type: object
    cell_cdma_nmr:
      description: CDMA Network measurement
      example:
        channel: 0
        pnoffset: 357
      properties:
        bsid:
          description: Base Station ID (Optional)
          example: 8584
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        channel:
          description: CDMA channel frequency
          example: 1
          maximum: 2047
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        pilotpower:
          description: Pilot Power (dBm) (Optional). If Pilot Power is not available
            directly, it needs to be calculated from Total Power in the band and
            Pilot Strength with respect to the Total Power. Pilot power less
            than -142dBm should be mapped to -142. Pilot power greater than
            -49dBm should be mapped to -49.
          example: -99
          maximum: -49
          minimum: -142
          type: integer
        pnoffset:
          description: Pseudonoise offset
          example: 357
          maximum: 511
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - pnoffset
        - channel
      type: object
    cell_gsm_locate:
      description: GSM measurement
      example:
        cid: 16504
        lac: 5126
        mcc: 262
        mnc: 1
        nmr:
          - bcch: "82"
            bsic: "6"
          - bcch: "85"
            bsic: "7"
          - bcch: "93"
            bsic: "12"
          - bcch: "88"
            bsic: "13"
          - bcch: "88"
            bsic: "19"
      properties:
        cid:
          description: Cell Identifier, 16 bits. Mcc+mnc+lac+cid uniquely identifies the
            GSM cell.
          example: 16504
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        lac:
          description: Location Area Code
          example: 5126
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        mcc:
          description: Mobile Country Code
          example: 262
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 200
          type: integer
        mnc:
          description: Mobile Network Code
          example: 1
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nmr:
          description: Network measurements (Optional)
          example:
            - bcch: "82"
              bsic: "6"
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_gsm_nmr"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        rxlevel:
          description: Received Signal power (dBm) (Optional). Power less than -110dBm
            should be mapped to -110. Power greater than -25dBm should be mapped
            to -25.
          example: -78
          maximum: -25
          minimum: -110
          type: integer
        ta:
          description: Timing advance (Optional). Expressed in the units of GSM bits
            equaling to 48/13 Î¼s ~ 1107 meters.
          example: 3
          maximum: 63
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - mcc
        - mnc
        - lac
        - cid
      type: object
    cell_gsm_nmr:
      description: GSM Network measurement
      example:
        bcch: "82"
        bsic: "6"
      properties:
        bcch:
          description: Broadcast Control Channel (Synonymous to ARFCN = Absolute Radio
            Frequency Channel)
          example: 82
          maximum: 1023
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        bsic:
          description: Base Station Identity Code (for instance, color code)
          example: 6
          maximum: 63
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        cid:
          description: Cell Identifier (Optional)
          example: 16503
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        lac:
          description: Location Area Code (Optional)
          example: 5126
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        rxlevel:
          description: Received Signal power (dBm) (Optional). Power less than -110dBm
            should be mapped to -110. Power greater than -25dBm should be mapped
            to -25.
          example: -77
          maximum: -25
          minimum: -110
          type: integer
      required:
        - bsic
        - bcch
      type: object
    cell_lte_locate:
      description: LTE measurement
      example:
        cid: 2898945
        mcc: 262
        mnc: 2
        nmr:
          - earfcn: 6300
            pci: 237
          - earfcn: 6300
            pci: 442
      properties:
        cid:
          description: E-UTRA Cell Identifier, 28 bits (20 bits eNodeB and 8 bits Cell id).
            Mcc+mnc+cid uniquely identifies the LTE cell, tac is optional.
          example: 2898945
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        mcc:
          description: Mobile Country Code
          example: 262
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 200
          type: integer
        mnc:
          description: Mobile Network Code
          example: 2
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nmr:
          description: LTE Network measurements (Optional)
          example:
            - earfcn: 6300
              pci: 237
            - earfcn: 6300
              pci: 442
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_lte_nmr"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        rsrp:
          description: Reference Signal Received Power = RSRP (dBm) (Optional, you must
            specify a value for this item when you specify a value for rsrq).
            Power less than -140dBm should be mapped to -140. Power greater than
            -44dBm should be mapped to -44.
          example: -95
          maximum: -44
          minimum: -140
          type: integer
        rsrq:
          description: Reference Signal Received Quality = RSRQ (dB) (Optional). Values
            less than -19.5dB should be mapped to -19.5, and values greater than
            -3dB should be mapped to -3dB.
          example: -12
          maximum: -3
          minimum: -19.5
          type: number
        ta:
          description: Timing Advance (Optional). Expressed in the units of 16*Ts (16 Basic
            time units) = 16/(15000*2048) seconds ~ 156meters. For reference see
            TS 36.213 and 36.211.
          example: 40
          maximum: 1282
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        tac:
          description: Tracking Area Code (Optional)
          example: 1
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - mcc
        - mnc
        - cid
      type: object
    cell_lte_nmr:
      description: LTE Network measurement
      example:
        earfcn: 6300
        pci: 237
      properties:
        cid:
          description: E-UTRA Cell Identifier (Optional)
          example: 2898945
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        earfcn:
          description: Evolved Absolute Radio Frequency Channel
          example: 6300
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        pci:
          description: Physical Cell Identity
          example: 237
          maximum: 503
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        rsrp:
          description: Reference Signal Received Power = RSRP (dBm) (Optional, you must
            specify a value for this item when you specify a value for rsrq).
            Power less than -140dBm should be mapped to -140. Power greater than
            -44dBm should be mapped to -44.
          example: -95
          maximum: -44
          minimum: -140
          type: integer
        rsrq:
          description: Reference Signal Received Quality = RSRQ (dB) (Optional). Values
            less than -19.5dB should be mapped to -19.5, and values greater than
            -3dB should be mapped to -3dB.
          example: -12
          maximum: -3
          minimum: -19.5
          type: number
      required:
        - pci
        - earfcn
      type: object
    cell_tdscdma_locate:
      description: TD-SCDMA measurement
      example:
        cid: 18563770
        mcc: 460
        mnc: 0
        nmr:
          - cellparams: 86
            uarfcn: 10100
          - cellparams: 14
            uarfcn: 10121
      properties:
        cid:
          description: UTRAN Cell Identifier, 28 bits (12 bits RNC and 16 bits Cell id).
            Mcc+mnc+cid uniquely identifies the TDSCDMA cell, lac is optional.
          example: 18563770
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        lac:
          description: Location Area Code (Optional)
          example: 1
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        mcc:
          description: Mobile Country Code
          example: 460
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 200
          type: integer
        mnc:
          description: Mobile Network Code
          example: 1
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nmr:
          description: Network measurements (Optional). Maximum of 8 distinct uarfcn
            frequencies.
          example:
            - cellparams: 86
              uarfcn: 10100
            - cellparams: 14
              uarfcn: 10121
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_tdscdma_nmr"
          maxItems: 32
          type: array
        ta:
          description: Timing advance (Optional). Round-Trip distance presented in the
            units of 4*c/7.68e6 ~156 meters. That is, the scaling factor is 4
            times the chip length at chip rate of 7.68 Mchips/s. Note that at
            chip rates 1.28 Mchips/s and 3.84 Mchips/s you need to scale
            according to chip length of 7.68 Mchips/s, that is, multiply by 6 or
            2 if needed.
          example: 20
          maximum: 1530
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - mcc
        - mnc
        - cid
      type: object
    cell_tdscdma_nmr:
      description: TD-SCDMA Network measurement
      example:
        cellparams: 86
        uarfcn: 10100
      properties:
        cellparams:
          description: Cell Parameters ID (CDMA Spreading Code ID)
          example: 86
          maximum: 127
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        cid:
          description: Cell Identifier (uc-id) (Optional)
          example: 18563772
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        pathloss:
          description: UTRAN path loss (dB) (Optional, you must specify a value for this
            item when you specify a value for rscp).
          example: 80
          maximum: 158
          minimum: 46
          type: integer
        rscp:
          description: Received Signal Code Power = RSCP (dBm) (Optional, you must specify
            a value for this item when you specify a value for pathloss). Power
            less than -120dBm should be mapped to -120. Power greater than
            -25dBm should be mapped to -25.
          example: -50
          maximum: -25
          minimum: -120
          type: integer
        uarfcn:
          description: Carrier frequency of a UTRA-TDD Serving Cell
          example: 10100
          maximum: 16383
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - uarfcn
        - cellparams
      type: object
    cell_wcdma_locate:
      description: WCDMA measurement
      example:
        cid: 14674663
        mcc: 262
        mnc: 7
        nmr:
          - psc: 149
            uarfcndl: 10786
          - psc: 211
            uarfcndl: 10762
      properties:
        cid:
          description: UTRAN Cell Identifier, 28 bits (12 bits RNC and 16 bits Cell id).
            Mcc+mnc+cid uniquely identifies the WCDMA cell, lac is optional.
          example: 14674663
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        lac:
          description: Location Area Code (Optional)
          example: 12345
          maximum: 65535
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        mcc:
          description: Mobile Country Code
          example: 262
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 200
          type: integer
        mnc:
          description: Mobile Network Code
          example: 7
          maximum: 999
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        nmr:
          description: Network measurements (Optional). Maximum of 8 distinct uarfcndl
            frequencies.
          example:
            - psc: 149
              uarfcndl: 10786
            - psc: 211
              uarfcndl: 10762
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_wcdma_nmr"
          maxItems: 32
          type: array
      required:
        - mcc
        - mnc
        - cid
      type: object
    cell_wcdma_nmr:
      description: WCDMA Network measurement
      example:
        psc: 149
        uarfcndl: 10786
      properties:
        cid:
          description: UTRAN Cell Identifier (uc-id) (Optional)
          example: 14674662
          maximum: 268435455
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        pathloss:
          description: UTRAN path loss (dB) (Optional).
          example: 90
          maximum: 158
          minimum: 46
          type: integer
        psc:
          description: Primary Scrambling Code (Primary CPICH, Primary Control Pilot
            Channel)
          example: 149
          maximum: 511
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        rscp:
          description: Received Signal Code Power = RSCP (dBm) (Optional). Power less than
            -120dBm should be mapped to -120. Power greater than -25dBm should
            be mapped to -25.
          example: -80
          maximum: -25
          minimum: -120
          type: integer
        uarfcndl:
          description: Downlink frequency of a UTRA-FDD Serving Cell
          example: 10786
          maximum: 16383
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
      required:
        - uarfcndl
        - psc
      type: object
    client_info:
      description: Information about the client
      example:
        manufacturer: Lemon
        model: Flagship X1
        name: FinderApp
        version: 2.0.31
      properties:
        firmware:
          description: Device firmware version information
          example: G506FXX453J1
          maxLength: 150
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        manufacturer:
          description: Manufacturer of the device (hardware)
          example: Lemon
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 2
          type: string
        model:
          description: Model of the device (hardware)
          example: Flagship X1
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        name:
          description: Name of the client software accessing the HERE API
          example: FinderApp
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 3
          type: string
        platform:
          description: Software platform information of the device, for example operating
            system name and version.
          example: Android 7.0
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 3
          type: string
        version:
          description: Version of the client software in format X.Y.Z, where X [0..255] is
            a major, Y [0..255] is a minor, and Z [0..65535] is a build version
            number. Increase the version/build number for each release of the
            client.
          example: 2.0.31
          maxLength: 13
          minLength: 3
          type: string
      required:
        - manufacturer
        - model
        - name
        - version
      type: object
    observations_locate:
      description: Object wrapping the location data submitted in a request for a position.
        At least one gsm, wcdma, tdscdma, lte, cdma, or wlan elements is
        required. The elements must be unique within the request.
      example:
        client:
          manufacturer: Lemon
          model: Flagship X1
          name: FinderApp
          version: 2.0.31
        lte:
          - cid: 2898945
            mcc: 262
            mnc: 2
        wlan:
          - mac: F4-55-95-11-2C-C1
      properties:
        cdma:
          description: CDMA cells
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_cdma_locate"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        client:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/client_info"
        gsm:
          description: GSM cells (GERAN)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_gsm_locate"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        lte:
          description: LTE cells (E-UTRA, 4G)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_lte_locate"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        tdscdma:
          description: TD-SCDMA cell (UTRA-TDD, 3G UMTS TDD)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_tdscdma_locate"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        wcdma:
          description: WCDMA cells (UTRA-FDD, 3G UMTS)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/cell_wcdma_locate"
          maxItems: 16
          type: array
        wlan:
          description: WLAN access points
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/wlan_locate"
          maxItems: 256
          type: array
    position_locate:
      description: Object containing information on a location where a measurement was
        taken.
      example:
        accuracy: 829
        alt: 142
        altaccuracy: 20
        lat: 61.4706194
        lng: 23.72265816
      properties:
        accuracy:
          description: Uncertainty circle radius in meters (degree of confidence according
            to the 'confidence' parameter).
          example: 829
          minimum: 1
          type: number
        alt:
          description: Altitude in meters (referenced to the WGS-84 ellipsoid) negative or
            positive.
          example: 142
          type: integer
        altaccuracy:
          description: Uncertainty of the altitude estimate in meters (degree of confidence
            according to the 'confidence' parameter).
          example: 20
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        lat:
          description: Latitude in WGS-84 format, decimal representation ranging from -90
            to 90.
          example: 61.4706194
          maximum: 90
          minimum: -90
          type: number
        lng:
          description: Longitude in WGS-84 format, decimal representation ranging from -180
            to 180.
          example: 23.72265816
          maximum: 180
          minimum: -180
          type: number
      required:
        - lat
        - lng
        - accuracy
      type: object
    response_error:
      description: Object wrapper for the error response to a request.
      example:
        error:
          code: 400
          description: "'mnc' must be less than or equal to 999"
          message: Bad Request
      properties:
        error:
          description: Object containing information about the error that happened
          properties:
            code:
              description: Same as the HTTP response status code
              type: integer
            description:
              description: More detailed message
              type: string
            statusMessage:
              description: Same as the HTTP status message
              type: string
          required:
            - code
            - statusMessage
          type: object
      required:
        - error
      type: object
    response_success_locate:
      description: Object wrapper for the response to a location request.
      properties:
        location:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/position_locate"
      required:
        - location
      type: object
    wlan_locate:
      description: WLAN measurement
      example:
        mac: 8C-1A-BF-20-66-AD
      properties:
        mac:
          description: >
            The MAC address of the WLAN access point. MAC-48 address with colon
            (:) or hyphen (-) separators, upper or lower case hex digits. Note
            that if the SSID contains postfix "_nomap", the AP should not be
            used for positioning. For privacy reasons positioning based on a
            single WLAN AP is not possible; there has to be at least one other
            matching wlan or cell. Alternative you can allow fallbacks to less
            accurate single WLAN AP location estimates by using the setting
            fallback=singleWifi.
          example: 8C-1A-BF-20-66-AD
          type: string
        powrx:
          description: Received signal level (dBm) at the terminal (Optional)
          example: -76
          maximum: 0
          minimum: -128
          type: integer
      required:
        - mac
      type: object
